author: USA TODAY, Ramon Padilla and Javier Zarracina, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus might spread much farther than 6 feet in the air. CDC says wear a mask in public.
description: New research shows that droplets in our coughs could travel as much as 26 feet.
content:
Air contaminated with the COVID-19 virus might travel four times farther than the 6 feet the CDC asks we distance ourselves, according to a recent study.
The study published in the Journal of the American Medical Association found that under the right condit… [+6870 chars]
